Summary: Malaysia Star Newspaper 18Oct95 color (and timed b&w) photos & Journalist witnesses of 3-mile-wide whole-body glowing yellow typical Flying-Saucer hovered many nights at Kampung Tanjung Sepat
divs: sighting detailsmalaysia star newspaper 18oct95 color (and timed b&w) photos & journalist & many witnesses of 3-mile-wide whole-body glowing yellow typical flying-saucer (with th hovered many nights at kampung tanjung sepat forest, near the yet-to-be-built currently klia (kuala lumpur international airport). i have the original newspaper clippings. interesting that village folks had seen "pillars of light" in the forest. so aborigines (orang-asli) claimed to have been kidnapped. village folk had seen the undercarraige of the huge craft as it flew overhead inthe day time. mutual ufo network walter-andrus is quoted in the newspaper reports. these are my cell-phone photos of the newspaper, my scanner is kaput, so i could not do a nice high-re for u. later will try. i never saw the ufo, i just have the newspaper-clippings since i am surprised that this clear ufo incident is not listed at wikipedia or http:\\news.yahoo.com\s\afp\20070918\sc_afp\peruhealthoffbeat http:\\www.alienationsam.com\historic_ufo\index.html (ufo) http:\\alienline.blogspot.com\2007\03\historical-alien.html (ufo) http:\\ufos.about.com\od\bestufocasefiles\p\ohareairport.htm http:\\members.tripod.com\~uforelie\foto2.html http:\\www.mufon.com\reportufo.htm please investigate.
